de.dhohmann.bukkit.craft

Class CraftRecipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhohmann.bukkit.craft.CraftRecipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GodAxe, GodPickaxe, GodShears, GodShovel, Nametag, Netherstar, Saddle

    public class CraftRecipe
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe
    Provides same features as a ShapedRecipe

    Enables subclasses to get direct access to the result

    Author:
    dhohmann
    See Also:
    ShapedRecipe

    • Constructor Detail

      • CraftRecipe

        public CraftRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
        Create a shaped recipe to craft the specified ItemStack. The constructor merely determines the result and type; to set the actual recipe, you'll need to call the appropriate methods.
        Parameters:
        result - The item you want the recipe to create.
        See Also:
        ShapedRecipe.shape(String...), ShapedRecipe.setIngredient(char, Material), ShapedRecipe.setIngredient(char, Material, int), ShapedRecipe.setIngredient(char, MaterialData)

    • Method Detail

      • shape

        public CraftRecipe shape(java.lang.String... shape)
        Set the shape of this recipe to the specified rows. Each character represents a different ingredient; exactly what each character represents is set separately. The first row supplied corresponds with the upper most part of the recipe on the workbench e.g. if all three rows are supplies the first string represents the top row on the workbench.
        Parameters:
        shape - The rows of the recipe (up to 3 rows).
        Returns:
        The changed recipe, so you can chain calls.

      • setIngredient

        public CraftRecipe setIngredient(char key,
                                 org.bukkit.material.MaterialData ingredient)
        Sets the material that a character in the recipe shape refers to.
        Parameters:
        key - The character that represents the ingredient in the shape.
        ingredient - The ingredient.
        Returns:
        The changed recipe, so you can chain calls.
